title: Game
description: Explore Star Atlas AAA space MMO gameplay across immersive third-person adventure and strategic fleet command modes.

title: Galia
description: Explore the unexplored in Star Atlas AAA space MMO. Take on unknown dangers and build your galactic empire in Galia.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_1_ImageThumbnail.png

title: Game Modes
description: Experience AAA shooter arena battles, racing tracks, PVE dogfights and more in Star Atlas space exploration MMO.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_2_ImageThumbnail.png

title: Your Fleet, Your Way
description: Customize your fleet in Star Atlas AAA space MMO. Explore ship interiors or command your entire armada your way.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_3_ImageThumbnail.png

title: Life in Galia
description: Discover diverse alien species from Punaabs to beings of pure light in Star Atlas AAA space exploration MMO.
poster: src/GAME section/3rd Person Experience/Thumbnails in carousel/Slide_4_ImageThumbnail.png

title: Fleet Command
description: Command vast fleets from a strategic top-down RTS view in Star Atlas AAA space MMO. Dominate Galia and outmaneuver factions.

title: Holosim
description: Play Holosim—a free-to-play strategic fleet simulation in Star Atlas AAA space MMO. No hardware or crypto wallet required.

title: SAGE Labs
description: Mine resources, craft items, and power the Star Atlas economy in SAGE Labs—the browser-based AAA space MMO experience.
